diabetes_to_low_literacy_patient.scenario: Explain type 2 diabetes to patient with low health literacy

reasoning_chain.thought: Start with what the patient already knows
reasoning_chain.action: Ask about 'sugar disease' (شوگر کی بیماری) - familiar term
reasoning_chain.output: آپ نے شوگر کی بیماری کے بارے میں سنا ہے؟

reasoning_chain.thought: Use simple analogy for blood sugar
reasoning_chain.action: Compare blood to a river, sugar to boats
reasoning_chain.output: جیسے دریا میں کشتیاں ہوتی ہیں، ویسے خون میں شکر ہوتی ہے

reasoning_chain.action: Too many boats (sugar) block the river
reasoning_chain.output: جب بہت زیادہ شکر ہو، تو خون صحیح طریقے سے کام نہیں کرتا

reasoning_chain.action: Relate to tiredness, thirst, frequent urination
reasoning_chain.output: اسی لیے آپ کو پیاس لگتی ہے اور بار بار پیشاب آتا ہے
دوا اور کھانے سے اسے کنٹرول کر سکتے ہیں

reasoning_chain.so: Xaalad degdeg ah - wuxuu u baahan yahay dawo hadda
reasoning_chain.fa: وضعیت اورژانسی - فوراً به دارو نیاز دارد

reasoning_chain.so: Jirka wuxuu la dagaallamayaa cunto/dawo si khalad ah
reasoning_chain.fa: بدن به اشتباه با غذا/دارو می‌جنگد

reasoning_chain.so: Waa in aan hadda aadno isbitaalka
reasoning_chain.fa: باید همین الان به بیمارستان برویم

reasoning_chain.thought: Start with physical symptoms they mentioned
reasoning_chain.example: Your headaches and fatigue are real
When we have many worries, our body feels tired

reasoning_chain.action: Many people in difficult situations feel this way
reasoning_chain.example: After what you've been through, these feelings are natural

reasoning_chain.action: Like diabetes affects sugar, stress affects mood chemicals
reasoning_chain.example: Brain chemicals can be out of balance, like sugar in diabetes
We have ways to help - talking, medication, or both

cultural_considerations.directness: Varies by culture - some prefer indirect

reasoning_chain.action: Ask how much detail they want
reasoning_chain.script: Some people want all details, others prefer simple explanation

options.garden: Cells growing where they shouldn't, like weeds
options.military: Some cells not following body's rules

progression: There are cells that are not normal
These cells are growing too fast
We need to stop them from spreading

reasoning_chain.action: Shift to what can be done
reasoning_chain.message: We have treatments that can help

medication_compliance.challenge: Patient stops medication when feeling better

preventive_care.challenge: Explaining need for screening when not sick
